sense.def:
Kadar duhovnik
preaches
, pri cerkvenem obredu govori o verskem ali moralnem vprašanju.

seg.quote: The chaplain preached to a packed church.

sense.def:
To preach a set of ideas
pomeni prepričevati ljudi, naj sprejmejo določene ideje.

seg.quote: He used to go round the villages preaching Socialism.
